desc: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

battle_talent.normal_desc1: Performs up to five consecutive spear strikes.
battle_talent.normal_desc2: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to opponents along the way.
battle_talent.normal_desc3: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
battle_talent.element_desc:
Summons Guoba, who will continuously breathe fire at opponents, dealing AoE Pyro DMG.

Guoba loves to eat spicy food. Problem is, his stomach can't handle something this spicy.
battle_talent.final_desc:
Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Pyronado whirling around her. The Pyronado will move with your character for the ability's duration, dealing Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path.

There will never be enough heat. Never.

basic_talent.talent2_desc: When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.
basic_talent.talent3_desc: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.
basic_talent.talent1_desc: When Guoba Attack's effect ends, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

sof.sof1_desc: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their Pyro RES reduced by 15% for 6s.
sof.sof2_desc: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as AoE Pyro DMG.
sof.sof3_desc:
Increases the Level of Pyronado by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof5_desc:
Increases the Level of Guoba Attack by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof6_desc: For the duration of Pyronado, all party members receive a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus.
